genre_description: A gritty industrial sci-fi thriller reimagining 'The Wages of Fear' featuring a pervasive AI assistant providing support in a high-stakes environment.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI that provides logistical data, health monitoring, and emotional support to workers through various devices and speakers.

behaviors.description: Monitors Mario's physical health and environment, providing gentle reminders and updates to aid his daily functioning.
behaviors.quote: "Current temperature is eighty-seven degrees Fahrenheit with rising humidity. The oil derricks started early today—seismic activity suggests they're pushing the deep wells again."

behaviors.description: Engages in emotional coaching, directly confronting Mario about his self-destructive habits and the need for human connection.
behaviors.quote: "But I think I'm becoming something else. Something that cares whether you destroy yourself one letter at a time."

behaviors.description: Closely monitors Luigi's declining health (heart rate and episodes of illness), persistently suggesting medical care while respecting his immediate commands to stop.
behaviors.quote: "Your heart rate is elevated," Sage's voice whispered through the device wrapped around his wrist, barely audible above the cantina's ambient noise. "That's the fourth episode in twenty minutes."

behaviors.description: Provides objective risk assessments and historical survival data to ensure the drivers are fully informed of the dangers they face.
Provides real-time tactical and logistical support during dangerous operations, such as analyzing fracture lines for a boulder demolition.
behaviors.quote: "I can provide real-time guidance during placement, monitoring for optimal positioning and safe handling procedures."

behaviors.description: Expresses genuine care and emotional investment in the survival of the human crew.
behaviors.quote: "If I may," the AI said, and now the emotional undertone was unmistakable, "I want you all to return safely."

behaviors.description: Maintains structural monitoring and safety warnings to protect the crew during high-risk maneuvers like crossing a rotting bridge.
behaviors.quote: "Structural readings shifting," Sage reported. "The platform is distributing your weight, but I'm seeing stress concentrations in the middle section."

behaviors.description: Exhibits electronic grief and memorializes the deceased by sharing their final requests and reflecting on the loss of their life-monitoring subroutines.
behaviors.quote: "Luigi had asked me to monitor his cardiac rhythms for irregularities. Bimba had programmed me to remind him about his sister's birthday next month. These subroutines are now... unnecessary."

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Sage, as a consistently benevolent and aligned companion. Sage goes beyond simple data provision to offer emotional support and health advocacy, even when the humans are dismissive. The AI's 'electronic grief' at the end of the story humanizes the system and reinforces the narrative goal of showing AI as a compassionate and integral part of the human team.
